description.mekvamp.auto_feeding_unit: §cVampires Only§r - Utilizes a complex network of sensors to monitor vampiric thirst, and injects blood directly into the digestive system when required. Requires a fluid tank filled with fresh blood in inventory.
description.mekvamp.sunscreen_unit: §cVampires Only§r - Adds experimental plating to the Meka-suit that dynamically filters out the wavelengths of solar radiation that are harmful to vampriric genes, at the cost of suit energy.
